content:
These don't show up under E-easy and E-mentor on rust-lang/rust, but they'd be easy to do and I'm too lazy to do them myself ;)

  • Write an intro to git for the dev-guide: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/issues/850
  • Split up some sections in the dev guide so they're easy to find: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/issues/831, https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/issues/853, https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/issues/866. In particular contributing.md is really giant, so it's hard to find things in the table of contents, you have to search.
  • Fix a rustdoc ICE around intra-doc links (this one is a little more challenging, but I'm happy to mentor): https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76692

I'm happy to answer questions about any of these, or if I don't have time I can point you to another team member with expertise.
if you want to pick any of these, kindly reply on the corresponding issue (or @rustbot assign ) to avoid multiple people ending up working on the same thing
